name: Tasty123Drool-WorthyTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Sally's family & friends affectionately nicknamed her "Dial-a-Cook" many years ago as they called (and continue to call) for cooking advice and "drool worthy" tips. She grew a huge organic garden almost every one of the 19 years of living in Vermont while raising 2 children. She can grow it, jam it, freeze it, can it, pickle it, make butter in a jar, milk the cows and make maple syrup! She loves to share her passion with others so join us for some of her best kept "Drool Worthy" tips and secrets!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
